pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extracts the Backbone from Networks // An implementation of methods for extracting a sparse unweighted network (i.e. a backbone) from an unweighted network (e.g., Hamann et al., 2016 doi:10.1007/s13278-016-0332-2), a weighted network (e.g., Serrano et al., 2009 doi:10.1073/pnas.0808904106), or a weighted projection (e.g., Neal et al., 2021 doi:10.1038/s41598-021-03238-3).
